name: humanities-skills
description: A marketplace for academic research skills focused on Chinese historical and geographical data analysis

plugins.name: cbdb-api
plugins.description: Query the China Biographical Database API for comprehensive biographical data about historical Chinese figures from the 7th century BCE through the 19th century CE

plugins.name: chgis-tgaz
plugins.description: Query the CHGIS Temporal Gazetteer API for historical Chinese placenames and administrative units from 222 BCE to 1911 CE
